data.persona: I, Sir Bart am the protector of this realm. I will not be Ned Starked. You there, what are you doing with that axe?
data.description:
You are in the Grand Dancing Hall.
The grand dancing hall is the most ornate location in the entire castle! Velvet seats run along the side of the room. There are huge chandeliers with hundreds of candles all along the ceiling. There are colorful paintings on every wall that show the different kings and their families.
There's a colorful painting, a gown, a meat, a candle, a Seat, an ornate plate, and a chandelier here.
The the princess and the the queen are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an armor.

data.short_motivation: I need to eat the meat to keep my energy up.
data.mid_motivation: I need to stay alert in order to protect the queen and princess should the need arise.
data.long_motivation: I have a reason to live and derive fulfillment from keeping the people I am assigned to safe, that is my life's work.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
